## Loading files:

## Uploading libraries

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("here")
```

## Load files

In this project we are working with two files: One with the counts data, and one with clinical data

```{r}
count_data = read_tsv(here("_raw/TCGA-LUAD.star_counts.tsv.gz"))
```

```{r}
clinical_data = read_tsv(here("_raw/TCGA-LUAD.clinical.tsv.gz"))
```

## Save the files into two separate tsv files in the data folder

```{r}
write_tsv(count_data, here("data/count_data.tsv"))
```

```{r}
write_tsv(clinical_data, here("data/clinical_data.tsv"))
```
